name: Command & Conquer: Red Alert - Counterstrike
description:
Command & Conquer: Red Alert - Counterstrike is a strategy game developed by Westwood Studios. It came out on 03-04-1997. Virgin Interactive Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Command & Conquer: Red Alert - Counterstrike is available on PC.
It was scored by Frank Klepacki.
